MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
Docs.remarks: Always dispose the object before you release your last reference to the . Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the finalizer.

MemberSignature.Value: public SkiaSharp.SKPixmap PeekPixels ();
.method public hidebysig instance class SkiaSharp.SKPixmap PeekPixels() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the pixels, if they are available.
Docs.returns: Returns the pixels, if they are available, otherwise .
Docs.remarks: If the pixels are available, then the surface is only valid until the surface changes in any way, in which case the pixmap becomes invalid.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool PeekPixels (SkiaSharp.SKPixmap pixmap);
.method public hidebysig instance bool PeekPixels(class SkiaSharp.SKPixmap pixmap) cil managed

Docs.param: The pixmap to receive the pixel information.
Docs.summary: Returns the pixmap of the surface.
Docs.returns: Returns on success, or if the surface does not have access to pixel data.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ReadPixels (SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo dstInfo, IntPtr dstPixels, int dstRowBytes, int srcX, int srcY);
.method public hidebysig instance bool ReadPixels(valuetype SkiaSharp.SKImageInfo dstInfo, native int dstPixels, int32 dstRowBytes, int32 srcX, int32 srcY) cil managed

Docs.param: The image information describing the destination pixel buffer.
The pixel buffer to read the pixel data into.
The number of bytes in each row of in the destination buffer.
The source x-coordinate to start reading from.
The source y-coordinate to start reading from.
Docs.summary: Copies the pixels from the surface into the specified buffer.
Docs.returns: Returns if the pixels were read, or if there was an error.
Docs.remarks: This method may return if the source rectangle [, , dstInfo.Width, dstInfo.Height] does not intersect the surface, or if the color type/alpha type could not be converted to the destination types.
